mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLEAN_COURSE(COURSE_NUMBER, COURSE_CATEGORY, COURSE_CATEGORY_NM, SOUTH_NORTH_DIV, SOUTH_NORTH_DIV_NM, AREA_GU, DISTANCE, LEAD_TIME, COURSE_LEVEL, COURSE_NAME, DETAIL_COURSE, CPI_IDX, CPI_NAME, X, Y, CPI_CONTENT) VALUES (#{courseNumber}, #{courseCategory}, #{courseCategoryNm}, #{southNorthDiv}, #{southNorthDivNm}, #{areaGu}, #{distance}, #{leadTime}, #{courseLevel}, #{content}, #{courseName}, #{detailCourse}, #{cpiIdx}, #{cpiName}, #{x}, #{y}, #{cpiContent})
